default: ½ mango, flesh scored in a criss-cross pattern with a sharp knife

steps: Place the mango onto a baking sheet. Drizzle over the honey and lime juice and sprinkle over the dried chilli flakes and brown sugar. Place into the oven and bake for five minutes, or until the sugar has melted and begun to caramelise.
Remove from the oven and transfer to a warm plate to serve.
title: Spiced mango with chilli, lemon and honey
